ModMetaData.name: [A17] NoFriendlyFire
ModMetaData.author: Billy [U:1:80628317]
ModMetaData.description:
(This mod has no requirements)
Don't you just hate it when a colonist shoots another accidentally? This mod stops bullets from hitting:
* Your colonists * Your animals
It doesn't stop bullets from hitting:
* Enemies * Friendly factions * Anything you specifically target
